title: Turn off assistant home button long press but keep squeeze active on Pixel 3 XL?
content: Is there a way to turn off the long home button press to activate Google Assistant while still allowing Squeeze to activate it?  I find the long press annoying as I seem to bring it up numerous times when I don't want to and the squeeze works perfectly.  I can't see a way to turn off just the long press.  Only thing I found was turning off assistant totally which I don't want to do.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
